basicnumber.name: extraplanarcontents
basicnumber.script: function onInit() local sItemName = string.lower(DB.getValue(window.getDatabaseNode(), 'name')) if ExtraplanarContainers.isAnyContainer(sItemName) then window.capacityweight.setVisible(true) window.extraplanarcontents.setVisible(true) onValueChanged() else window.capacityweight.setVisible(false) window.extraplanarcontents.setVisible(false) end end function onValueChanged() if window.capacityweight.getValue() ~= 0 then if getValue() < window.capacityweight.getValue() then setColor('FF000000') elseif getValue() == window.capacityweight.getValue() then setColor('FFEB7B00') elseif getValue() > window.capacityweight.getValue() then setColor('FFB22929') end end end

basicnumber.name: contentsvolume
basicnumber.script: function onInit() if OptionsManager.isOption('ITEM_VOLUME', 'off') then window.external_dimensions_label.setVisible(false) window.length.setVisible(false) window.width.setVisible(false) window.depth.setVisible(false) window.volume.setVisible(false) else window.external_dimensions_label.setVisible(true) window.length.setVisible(true) window.width.setVisible(true) window.depth.setVisible(true) window.volume.setVisible(true) end local sItemName = string.lower(DB.getValue(window.getDatabaseNode(), 'name')) if OptionsManager.isOption('ITEM_VOLUME', 'on') and ExtraplanarContainers.isAnyContainer(sItemName) then window.contentsvolume.setVisible(true) window.internal_dimensions_label.setVisible(true) window.internal_length.setVisible(true) window.internal_width.setVisible(true) window.internal_depth.setVisible(true) window.internal_volume.setVisible(true) onValueChanged() else window.contentsvolume.setVisible(false) window.internal_dimensions_label.setVisible(false) window.internal_length.setVisible(false) window.internal_width.setVisible(false) window.internal_depth.setVisible(false) window.internal_volume.setVisible(false) end end function onValueChanged() if window.internal_volume.getValue() ~= 0 then if getValue() < window.internal_volume.getValue() then setColor('FF000000') elseif getValue() == window.internal_volume.getValue() then setColor('FFEB7B00') elseif getValue() > window.internal_volume.getValue() then setColor('FFB22929') end end end

basicnumber.name: volume
basicnumber.script: function onInit() getVolume() end function getVolume() local nSum = window.length.getValue() * window.width.getValue() * window.depth.getValue() setValue(nSum) window.contentsvolume.onValueChanged() end function onValueChanged() window.contentsvolume.onValueChanged() end

basicnumber.name: internal_volume
basicnumber.script: function onInit() getVolume() end function getVolume() local nSum = window.internal_length.getValue() * window.internal_width.getValue() * window.internal_depth.getValue() setValue(nSum) end
